notes.title: Pet the dogs
notes.text: I have 3 dogs whose names are Boots, Coco, and Maple.

notes.title: Brush the Schnauzer
notes.text: Maple is the Schnauzer. She gets her hair tangled every day

notes.title: Test Delete Function ->
notes.text: Even though I know you're going to try to delete all the other notes. *stares*
